lines.text: I want to work on my projects already! Why do I have to have "social contact"?
One day I'll invent a robotic double that pretends to be me and goes to make friends.
Hey! Did you know that if you hook a Voltorb to an asynchronous transponder, you can alter the...
When I was a kid, I accidentally uploaded a virus to my parents' Porygon2.
I only wanted to upgrade it further! They were so angry!
I've modded my PC. Now I can organize my Pokémon in glorious 3D!
It just looks better, I think. And I think my Pokémon like it.
